text: Ani tya ghatanecahi ullekha kara, jevha kaphira (inkari) loka tumacyavisayi kata-karasthana racata hote ki tumhala kaidi banavuna ghyave kinva tumhala thara karave kinva tumhala desabahera ghalavave ani te apala kata racata hote ani sarvasrestha allaha apali yojana akhata hota ani sarvasrestha allaha sarvanta uttama yojana banavinara ahe
